translated: Diha WUWE lara badatadayi tutna kapore Korona bana pala ta diha ata-diha ata
we tarumna ata kalawara bana tamawe
Hamarau wikna. Kailam yanau we tarumna bamudedewu
YID MASKER. Tanam badatagge waleka badaihoraka kana engage lar tamasker illa napala we ta ata heka.
Noto hege nade ata walena kalawara’ma. Tanyiduwe karawa dahenage tauna.
Ata behayanna bena kapore dadi ai kamang tadkana
Kahada baningu kada hadikorauge tauda wal ta ata buta
waleka mata ata olem ta uma
Nyi ai wuk kamuge bamunarodi rattu tangadi kadana
Wuwe lara kahadda yannana kadahilpa walta kapore Korona balidaka bahayi limmada waina habo
Kapore Korona natahna kahha diki dokabul pata jam ta pan tangngadi hadau.
Oro bataudage dau dahage dokge rade pata pahilpa dangngada.
Ilam jojawe matam (mono mata ata wadeka).
Aga linna dawe hada baha limma kana murahai?
Kapore naha ana lar tamasker bana mojage bada waige.
Baitage maskerumu bana matkage. Ila waikana masker reh walta wu lado.
Wale nadadimawe bammu jojawe matamu waina hima’la daumu
Be bamhagawu aimu tamahou ta umma
Bacayi hatak wadeka hatulha radde dete!

source: Olumbe lwa Korona                                                                                      Olumbe lwa Korona
translated: Tutge kapore Korona    Diha WUWE lara badatadayi tutna kapore Korona bana pala ta diha ata-diha ata   ta baana ta karruna ta matana we tarumna ata kalawara bana tamawe  Ata ai kalawara Ata kalawara  Kapore Korona napala wali ta
